===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[paper]] {{zh-mw|張}}
#* {{zh-x|她 買 了 紙、筆 以及 諸如此類 的 文具。|She has bought '''paper''', pens, and other such stationery.}}
#* {{zh-x|他 用 棕色 的 紙 把 包裹 包 起來。|He wrapped brown '''paper''' around the package.}}
#* {{zh-x|自古 書契 多 編 以 竹簡，其 用 縑帛 者 謂 之 為{wéi} 紙。縑 貴 而 簡 重，並 不 便 於 人。倫 乃 造意，用 樹膚、麻頭 及 敝布、魚網 以 為{wéi} 紙。^元興 元年 奏 上 之，帝 善 其 能，自 是 莫 不 從 用 焉，故 天下 咸 稱 「^蔡 侯 紙」。|In ancient times writings and inscriptions were generally made on tablets of bamboo or on pieces of silk called '''''zhi'''''. But silk being costly and bamboos heavy they were not convenient to use. {{w|Cai Lun}} then initiated the idea of making '''paper''' from the bark of trees, remnants of hemp, rags of cloth and fishing nets. He submitted the process to the emperor in the first year of {{w|Emperor He of Han#Era names|Yuanxing}} and received praise for his ability. From this time, paper has been in use everywhere and is universally called "the '''paper''' of Marquis Cai".|CL|ref=Houhanshu}}
